title: Bootycall, Part 2
description: I’m going to show her just how good a bad boy can be...  Everything’s riding on my comeback, but suddenly, Hollywood is the last thing on my mind. Gemma Clark was supposed to keep me out of trouble, but now I’m in way over my head. What we have is real — too real. It’s just a matter of time before it all comes crashing down.  I need to face my demons, but what happens when she discovers the truth?
author: J.D. Hawkins
